class_g_01_home_01:
I see we have some energetic young ones in our
class this time around.[VAR 0114(002C)]
class_g_01_home_02:
You may call me Mr. Saguaro.\c
Your time here with me will be spent obtaining
knowledge and skills indispensable for daily life.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_home_03:
Many of you have left the care of your parents to
live here on your own in the academy dormitory.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_home_04:
I pray that the knowledge I impart to you will
improve the quality of your lives and the\r
necessities thereof—food, clothing, and shelter.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_home_05:
Of those three categories, I assume the most
pressing and interesting for you all is food.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_home_06:
When you eat sandwiches on your picnics, the HP
of your party Pokémon will be restored.\c
You will also gain something called [VAR COLOR(0006)]Meal Powers[VAR COLOR(0000)],
which can provide all manner of benefits.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_home_07:
For example, these powers can make Pokémon
easier to catch or increase the Exp. Points that\r
your Pokémon receive.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_home_08:
I think you will also find that the breadth of these
effects can be expanded by crafting sandwiches\r
of superb flavor.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_home_09:
What’s more, there is a certain something that is
particularly important if we wish to receive Meal\r
Powers with even more helpful effects.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_home_10:
Let me see... M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!\c
Tell me—what must you keep in mind to receive
even more helpful Meal Powers?[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_select_01: My choice of fillings and condiments
class_g_01_select_02: How fast I can prepare the food
class_g_01_select_03: I have to remember to put my heart into it!
class_g_01_home_answer_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Perfectly correct, M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]!\c
Perhaps you were already aware of this fact from
having helped your family with cooking at home?[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_home_answer_02:
That is...incorrect. I pray that you all put more
emphasis on doing things well when cooking\r
rather than simply rushing to finish quickly.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_home_answer_03:
Ha! That is an interesting take. Though not
exactly what I was looking for, I suppose you are\r
correct, in a sense.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_home_11:
Your choice of ingredients—including both fillings
and condiments—is an important factor in gaining\r
even more helpful Meal Powers.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_home_12:
For example, using sweet ingredients in your
sandwiches may help you gain Egg Power.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_home_13:
Including numerous bitter ingredients, on the
other hand, can gain you Item Drop Power.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_home_14:
Learning to aim for specific effects when crafting
sandwiches will almost certainly make your\r
culinary endeavors more enjoyable.\c
Please be aware, however, that you can also
receive Meal Powers by eating at restaurants.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_home_15:
I must say that I would feel the utmost joy if you
all learned much here in my class and came to\r
better understand home economics.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_01_home_16:
Our time together has come to an end for today.
I bid you all farewell.[VAR 0114(0029)]
